channel.title: Making this tree reappear

item.title: Making this tree reappear
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

Ok, I broke down woodcutting into a basic case. I made it remove the tree and add a stump.

case 1278: if(playerHasItem(1351) || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1351) { startAnimation(879); addItem(1511, 1); addSkillXP(1000, 8); sendMessage("You get some logs."); reetimer ++; } else { sendMessage("You need an axe to cut this tree!"); sendMessage("Try ::axeplz"); }{ if (treetimer == 1){ replaceTree(objectX, objectY, 1342); treetimer = 0; } } break;
How would one go about making that stump turn into a tree again, after a certain amount of time(like 10 seconds)

Read full topic
